articles.description: England's T20 World Cup defence is already in danger after a damaging 36-run defeat by Australia in Barbados.
articles.title: T20 World Cup results: England's defence in danger after 36-run Australia defeat

articles.description: George Russell takes Mercedes’ first pole position of the season ahead of Red Bull’s Max Verstappen at the Canadian Grand Prix.
articles.title: Canadian Grand Prix 2024: George Russell beats Max Verstappen to pole

articles.description: French Open winner Iga Swiatek's aura at Roland Garros is becoming so great that she is being dubbed the 'Queen of Clay' - and tipped for a career Grand Slam.
articles.title: French Open 2024: From stress to serenity - how Iga Swiatek won 'surreal' fifth major

articles.description: David Miller's unbeaten half-century helps South Africa avoid a hat-trick of World Cup upsets against the Netherlands after a nervy four-wicket victory in New York.
articles.title: T20 World Cup results: David Miller's half-century helps South Africa to nervy victory Netherlands in New York

articles.description: Northern Ireland's three game unbeaten run comes to an end with a comprehensive 5-1 defeat to Spain at the Son Moix Stadium.
articles.title: Spain show their class to beat Northern Ireland

articles.description: The Philadelphia Phillies cruise past the New York Mets 7-2 in the opening game of the MLB's London Series at London Stadium.
articles.title: MLB London Series: Philadelphia Phillies beat New York Mets in opener

articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz aims to become another Spanish French Open winner when he faces Germany's Alexander Zverev in Sunday's men's final.
articles.title: French Open 2024 final: Carlos Alcaraz faces Alexander Zverev in Roland Garros showpiece

articles.description: World number seven Jon Rahm withdraws after just six holes of the second round of LIV Golf Houston on Saturday suffering an infection in his left foot.
articles.title: Jon Rahm suffers injury with less than a week until US Open

articles.description: Savannah Marshall stops Mirela Vargas in the first round of an electric MMA debut in front of her home fans at PFL Europe in Newcastle.
articles.title: PFL Newcastle: Savannah Marshall stops Mirela Vargas on MMA debut

articles.description: Gareth Southgate welcomes Jude Bellingham into the England camp but says “we are not putting everything on” him.
articles.title: Jude Bellingham: England boss Gareth Southgate says 'we're not putting everything on him'
